name: Snake Lite
description:
Control a snake in darkness. Try to survive as long as possible:)

Hard mode now unlocked at 50 points in Normal Mode.!

Hard Mode: Think one snake is easy? Try two:)

Controls:

Arrow Keys: Move the snake

Space Bar: Start the Game

Want to know how this game was made?

Check out my Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/johncm99
